name: Summer ReCharge
long_desc: The goal of this course is to provide students with the tools they will need to become better equipped to handle the challenges they have or will face in their academic experiences.  It is designed to promote student awareness of the necessary components of a successful educational experience.   Each week, students will engage in selfawareness activities and group discussion of topics in key areas shown to be predictive of student success.  Through discussion with peers, exposure to academic findings, and selfreflection essays, this course will provide students with the opportunity for selfgrowth and allow them to become better connected with the campus community.
